name: It this what it takes
description:
This is a platformer game, based on the pressures of being a student in university and travelling each day - missing out on social events, having grades slip and falling into a depression - you runaway from home - and must come to terms with battling yourself and your inner demons - and taking ecstasy and modifinal - two of the most common drugs taken by university students in 2016.

The game is navigated using the "A" "D" and "J" keys as well as the left mouse click to shoot in the second level.

So tell me; drugs, anxiety, depression, failing - is this what it takes?
